trans-unit.source: Creating an Import Job
trans-unit.target: Creating an Import Job

trans-unit.source: Creating an import job for the Microsoft Azure Import/Export service using the REST API involves the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Creating an import job for the Microsoft Azure Import/Export service using the REST API involves the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Preparing drives with the Azure Import/Export tool.
trans-unit.target: Preparing drives with the Azure Import/Export tool.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the location to which to ship the drive.
trans-unit.target: Obtaining the location to which to ship the drive.

trans-unit.source: Creating the import job.
trans-unit.target: Creating the import job.

trans-unit.source: Shipping the drives to Microsoft via a supported carrier service.
trans-unit.target: Shipping the drives to Microsoft via a supported carrier service.

trans-unit.source: Updating the import job with the shipping details.
trans-unit.target: Updating the import job with the shipping details.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Using the Microsoft Azure Import/Export Service to Transfer Data to Blob Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=329852%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink> for an overview of the Import/Export service and a tutorial that demonstrates how to use the <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink> to create and manage import and export jobs.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Using the Microsoft Azure Import/Export Service to Transfer Data to Blob Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=329852%%amp;amp;clcid=0x409</linkUri></externalLink> for an overview of the Import/Export service and a tutorial that demonstrates how to use the <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink> to create and manage import and export jobs.

trans-unit.source: Preparing Drives with the Azure Import/Export Tool
trans-unit.target: Preparing Drives with the Azure Import/Export Tool

trans-unit.source: The steps to prepare drives for an import job are the same whether you create the job via the portal or via the REST API.
trans-unit.target: The steps to prepare drives for an import job are the same whether you create the job via the portal or via the REST API.

trans-unit.source: Below is a brief overview of drive preparation.
trans-unit.target: Below is a brief overview of drive preparation.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <link xlink:href="f77535bb-d577-438a-bdd3-e15a82e0c543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WAImportExport Tool Reference</link> for complete instructions.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the <link xlink:href="f77535bb-d577-438a-bdd3-e15a82e0c543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WAImportExport Tool Reference</link> for complete instructions.

trans-unit.source: You can download the Azure Import/Export tool <externalLink><linkText>here</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=301900</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download the Azure Import/Export tool <externalLink><linkText>here</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=301900</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Preparing your drive involves:
trans-unit.target: Preparing your drive involves:

trans-unit.source: Identifying the data to be imported.
trans-unit.target: Identifying the data to be imported.

trans-unit.source: Identifying the destination blobs in Windows Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: Identifying the destination blobs in Windows Azure Storage.

trans-unit.source: Using the Azure Import/Export tool to copy your data to one or more hard drives.
trans-unit.target: Using the Azure Import/Export tool to copy your data to one or more hard drives.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Import/Export tool will also generate a manifest file for each of the drives as it is prepared.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Import/Export tool will also generate a manifest file for each of the drives as it is prepared.

trans-unit.source: A manifest file contains:
trans-unit.target: A manifest file contains:

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of all the files intended for upload and the mappings from these files to blobs.
trans-unit.target: An enumeration of all the files intended for upload and the mappings from these files to blobs.

trans-unit.source: Checksums of the segments of each file.
trans-unit.target: Checksums of the segments of each file.

trans-unit.source: Information about the metadata and properties to associate with each blob.
trans-unit.target: Information about the metadata and properties to associate with each blob.

trans-unit.source: A listing of the action to take if a blob that is being uploaded has the same name as an existing blob in the container.
trans-unit.target: A listing of the action to take if a blob that is being uploaded has the same name as an existing blob in the container.

trans-unit.source: Possible options are: a) overwrite the blob with the file b) keep the existing blob and skip uploading the file, c) append a suffix to the name so that it does not conflict with other files.
trans-unit.target: Possible options are: a) overwrite the blob with the file b) keep the existing blob and skip uploading the file, c) append a suffix to the name so that it does not conflict with other files.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining Your Shipping Location
trans-unit.target: Obtaining Your Shipping Location

trans-unit.source: Before creating an import job, you need to obtain a shipping location name and address by calling the <link xlink:href="6260cd93-6c8e-4986-a2b6-a3c9df886ff6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Locations</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Before creating an import job, you need to obtain a shipping location name and address by calling the <link xlink:href="6260cd93-6c8e-4986-a2b6-a3c9df886ff6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Locations</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> will return a list of locations and their mailing addresses based on the location of your storage account.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> will return a list of locations and their mailing addresses based on the location of your storage account.

trans-unit.source: You can select a location from the returned list and ship your hard drives to that address.
trans-unit.target: You can select a location from the returned list and ship your hard drives to that address.

trans-unit.source: Note that <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> returns only one possible shipping location.
trans-unit.target: Note that <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> returns only one possible shipping location.

trans-unit.source: Follow the steps below to obtain the shipping location:
trans-unit.target: Follow the steps below to obtain the shipping location:

trans-unit.source: Identify the name of the location of your storage account.
trans-unit.target: Identify the name of the location of your storage account.

trans-unit.source: This value can be found under the <embeddedLabel>Location</embeddedLabel> field on the storage account’s <embeddedLabel>Dashboard</embeddedLabel> in the management portal or queried for by using the service management API operation <link xlink:href="06de06a9-3363-4c03-8a99-3fbaf761642c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Storage Account Properties</link>.
trans-unit.target: This value can be found under the <embeddedLabel>Location</embeddedLabel> field on the storage account’s <embeddedLabel>Dashboard</embeddedLabel> in the management portal or queried for by using the service management API operation <link xlink:href="06de06a9-3363-4c03-8a99-3fbaf761642c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Storage Account Properties</link>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve a list of locations that are available to process this storage account by calling the <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> operation with the query parameter <codeInline>originlocation=%%amp;lt;location-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Retrieve a list of locations that are available to process this storage account by calling the <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> operation with the query parameter <codeInline>originlocation=%%amp;lt;location-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The list returned will contain one or more locations to which you can ship your drives.
trans-unit.target: The list returned will contain one or more locations to which you can ship your drives.

trans-unit.source: Select a location from the returned list and note its name and mailing address.
trans-unit.target: Select a location from the returned list and note its name and mailing address.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> either returns one possible location, or none.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>List Locations</languageKeyword> either returns one possible location, or none.

trans-unit.source: If no locations are returned, the service is not yet available for your storage account.
trans-unit.target: If no locations are returned, the service is not yet available for your storage account.

trans-unit.source: Creating the Import Job
trans-unit.target: Creating the Import Job

trans-unit.source: To create the import job, call the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: To create the import job, call the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: You will need to provide the following information:
trans-unit.target: You will need to provide the following information:

trans-unit.source: A name for the job.
trans-unit.target: A name for the job.

trans-unit.source: The storage account name.
trans-unit.target: The storage account name.

trans-unit.source: The storage account key.
trans-unit.target: The storage account key.

trans-unit.source: The shipping location name, obtained from the previous step.
trans-unit.target: The shipping location name, obtained from the previous step.

trans-unit.source: A job type (Import).
trans-unit.target: A job type (Import).

trans-unit.source: The return address where the drives should be sent after the import job has completed.
trans-unit.target: The return address where the drives should be sent after the import job has completed.

trans-unit.source: The list of drives in the job.
trans-unit.target: The list of drives in the job.

trans-unit.source: For each drive, you must include the following information that was obtained during the drive preparation step:
trans-unit.target: For each drive, you must include the following information that was obtained during the drive preparation step:

trans-unit.source: The drive Id
trans-unit.target: The drive Id

trans-unit.source: The BitLocker key
trans-unit.target: The BitLocker key

trans-unit.source: The manifest file relative path on the hard drive
trans-unit.target: The manifest file relative path on the hard drive

trans-unit.source: The Base16 encoded manifest file MD5 hash
trans-unit.target: The Base16 encoded manifest file MD5 hash

trans-unit.source: Shipping Your Drives
trans-unit.target: Shipping Your Drives

trans-unit.source: You must ship your drives to the address that you obtained from the previous step,and you must provide the Import/Export service with the tracking number of the package.
trans-unit.target: You must ship your drives to the address that you obtained from the previous step,and you must provide the Import/Export service with the tracking number of the package.

trans-unit.source: You must ship your drives via a supported carrier service, which will provide a tracking number for your package.
trans-unit.target: You must ship your drives via a supported carrier service, which will provide a tracking number for your package.

trans-unit.source: Updating the Import Job with Your Shipping Information
trans-unit.target: Updating the Import Job with Your Shipping Information

trans-unit.source: After you have your tracking number, call the <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operation to update the shipping carrier name, the tracking number for the job, and the carrier account number for return shipping.
trans-unit.target: After you have your tracking number, call the <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operation to update the shipping carrier name, the tracking number for the job, and the carrier account number for return shipping.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally specify the number of drives and the shipping date as well.
trans-unit.target: You can optionally specify the number of drives and the shipping date as well.
